Figure 32. Poincaré plots of the R system. In the upper plot, η = 0.1, in the lower plot, η = 0.5.
The upper insets provide close-ups of the chaotic region at the top of the diagram, which is similar to
the N system, but distorted in shape. The lower insets are close-ups of the structure in the pretzel; it
is likewise distorted relative to the N system, with the distortions growing as η increases.
